original_title: Ang Maangas, ang Marikit at ang Makata
overview: About the characters meeting on an ordinary day. Alfonso, a gunman from the Other Side goes to town in search of the Captain for a payment that is owed to him. He arrived at the house seeing Liwliw, the Captain's daughter practicing her dance. Complications arise when Delfin, a passionate poet, serenades the young lady.
title: Ang Maangas, ang Marikit at ang Makata
